model.name: capital_costs
eligibility_basis
energy_produced
energy_sale_revenue
nameplate
model.prompt: """ Search all relevant project documents (including but not limited to Interconnection Agreement, EPC Contract, Independent Engineering Report, Construction and Term Loan Agreement, Tax Equity Agreements, Appraisal and Cost Segregation Report, O&M and Asset Management Agreements, Site Control or Lease Agreement, Power Purchasing Agreement, and Certificates of Insurance) for instances of \"Project Nameplate\" or \"Nameplate\" values. Nameplate may also be indicated by the keyword \"capacity\".  Return the following:  1. Summary: A high-level summary of nameplate findings. Highlight if all values are the same. Note possible discrepancies.   2. List documents inspected that have nameplate values. Include both AC and DC nameplate ratings if available. If multiple nameplate ratings appear within a single document, provide each separately with their contextual description.   For each document, output the information in bullet point format as follows:  - <Document Name>:    - <Contextual description>: <value>  For example:  - Interconnection Agreement   - DC Nameplate: 50 MW AC  - EPC Contract   - Project Capacity: 700 kW DC  """
